```{r Properties of the estimate}
```

\[
W_2 = [0,500] \times [0,250]. 
\]

```{r}
W <- c("W2","W2","W2")
Model <- c("Strauss","Strauss","Geyer")
nbre.pts <- round(c(StrII.02_W2$l15,StrII.05_W2$l15,GeyII_W2$l15))
```


```{r}
SCEN2.W2.BIC.LASSO <- rbind(Estimate.Properties(StrII.02_W2$l1,Theta.Init.StraussII2.02,method="pen"),Estimate.Properties(StrII.05_W2$l1,Theta.Init.StraussII2.05,method="pen"),Estimate.Properties(GeyII_W2$l1,Theta.Init.GeyerII2,method="pen"))
SCENARIO2.W2.BIC.LASSO <- cbind(W,Model,SCEN2.W2.BIC.LASSO,nbre.pts)
knitr::kable(SCENARIO2.W2.BIC.LASSO, caption="Lasso penalty and cBIC")
```
